# nonReversing

**Instance Property**

An effect that doesn’t reverse each time it repeats.

## Declaration

```swift
var nonReversing: VariableColorSymbolEffect { get }
```

## Changing playback style

- **reversing**: An effect that reverses each time it repeats.
